text: Neelam Sanjiva Reddy (19 May 1913 â€“ 1 June 1996) was an Indian politician. He was the sixth President of India from 1977 to 1982. He was the Speaker of the Lok Sabha from 1967 to 1969 and again in 1977. Reddy died on 1 June 1996 from pneumonia in Bangalore, Karnataka at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Presidents of India Category:Speakers of the Lok Sabha Category:Politicians from Andhra Pradesh Category:Presidents of the Indian National Congress Category:Indian National Congress politicians
title: Neelam Sanjiva Reddy
